message: Yeah, we plan on addressing this soon, the "reply" text was always supposed to be a placeholder until we could find a suitable icon (actually, we have the icon, it just needs to be rasterized and put in the css properly)
If I want to star a phrase, the link moves around.
on mouseover, the star changes to a "reply" link and the star is moved over.
The reply on-hover thing should put the reply link on the outside of the star so it doesn't move.
(this was the case for previously starred items)
We're probably not going to make you have to hover
This will have the same problem if you have an icon.
The ordering should be the thing which appears on hover should be added to the end and the thing which is static shouldn't move.
